channel.title: Comments on: Speculative-Inspired Arts: GLEO
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Speculative-Inspired Arts: A Look Back and Ahead – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: Speculative-Inspired Arts: A Look Back and Ahead – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] GLEO: “It’s funny, because I’ve just been available where the opportunity has led me. And so in the midst of what the end of the world has felt like, I was painting a large-scale wall, where every day it was an internal mission to find that tranquility that we are all looking for in these times. On this wall, I wanted to portray ‘good intention’—the opportunity to let our hearts flourish in the midst of pain.” See more of GLEO’s latest projects via her Instagram @gleo_co. […]
item.content:encoded: […] GLEO: “It’s funny, because I’ve just been available where the opportunity has led me. And so in the midst of what the end of the world has felt like, I was painting a large-scale wall, where every day it was an internal mission to find that tranquility that we are all looking for in these times.  On this wall, I wanted to portray ‘good intention’—the opportunity to let our hearts flourish in the midst of pain.” See more of GLEO’s latest projects via her Instagram @gleo_co. […]
